messages: c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:08): is this playing for anyone if FF? https://audiofile.cc/boombox
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:09): i have it working in FF and opera now on localhost but when I push it to production it doesn't work for me in FF.
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:22): c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2: it worked in chrome so i'll try it in ff now.
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:22): You know, FF doesn't play mp3's with html5, right?
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:22): its not working in ff
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:22): i am using feature detection to serve ogg to ff and opera
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:22): I have a flash player I like to use as a fallback.
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:22): oh really, cool.
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:22): it's working in ff on my local but not on production
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:22): can't figure out why
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:23): check out line 43 https://github.com c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2/boombox.js/blob/master/boombox.js
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:23): It's not working in FF for me.
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:23): 43 through 48 are the lines that are the feature detection
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:23): how strange
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:23): it's working on my local host
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:24): oh well. At least it's working in opera and on my local host in FF. That's a good victory
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:25): do you have the audio files on the server?
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (09:25): walks in, having successfully survived windows xp
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:25): yeah. it works in opera
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:25): the same ogg file so i know it's working
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:25): i mean I know it's on the server
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:26): what's with .replace(/no/, '') ?
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (09:26): keeps seeing people from this chat get RT'd for cool shit
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (09:26): i need to work on that, so i get RT'd too
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:26): 70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132: it's from http://diveintohtml5.org/everything.html
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:30): what's the actual site?
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:30): whoops
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:30): https://audiofile.cc//boombox
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:31): oh got it, because it replaces 'no' with nothing.
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:31): so it would evaluate as false
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:34): can you console stuff, cg?
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:34): identify at what point it fails to do what it should.
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:35): i have it logging to the console when you click the play button and it's showing the correct path to the file
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:35): so I'm kinda stumped.
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:35): but yeah. I'm debugging and consoling
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:35): it's working locally so at least I have that to go on
70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132 (09:36): I'll do a checkout and see if I have the same issue.
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:37): cool. thanks

0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (09:43): good, i'm not alone on that part
2360aabaa09d5610935ee7e2283f0780 (09:47): http://openmya.hacker.jp/hasegawa/security/utf7cs.html
2360aabaa09d5610935ee7e2283f0780 (09:47): if you don't explicitly set a charset
2360aabaa09d5610935ee7e2283f0780 (09:47): IEs can sniff your charset automagically
2360aabaa09d5610935ee7e2283f0780 (09:47): to be something like UTF-7
2360aabaa09d5610935ee7e2283f0780 (09:48): which allows a whole new set of vectors
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:48): 70bfd0ae2cfbf2da192bddd569cf6132: ok I got an example up
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:49): actually it's uploading the songs

0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (09:51): Webkit and Opera?

c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:51): is it a fail if I upload 4 songs to the github account. It feels like the wrong thing to do. How can I have a working example on github without having 2 versions (ogg and mp3) on uploaded?
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:51): 0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17:  good chart http://dev.opera.com/articles/view/html5-audio-radio-player/
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (09:51): is submitting to reddit but wants a note about current support for boombox
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (09:52): so do a quick 1 sentence current support writeup :P

c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (09:52): 0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17: boombox currently works in opera, chrome, safari, safari iOS. Firefox is working locally but not on production so that should be solved by tomorrow
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (09:53): http://www.reddit.com/r/webdev/comments/i51x5/boomboxjs_html5_audio_player_by_audiofilecc/
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (09:56): like a yard stick!
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (09:57): another idea regarding your audio files in the repo...perhaps point to a place to easily get CC/public domain audio files to tinker with

c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (10:00): yeah thats a good idea. It might be the better choice, I dont want to discourage people from forking this code because they don't want the massive binary files
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (10:01): the question is if I delete them from my local master branch and then push to github will a person who clones the branch stil need to download the files.
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (10:01): either that, or just small samples
c41d451ed773297423055eb1b05dcbd2 (10:01): that seems like a question for #git
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (10:02): you know, kids stuff, with hidden backwards messages from lucifer
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (10:02): claiming if they take hard drugs they'll be visiting him in the future
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (10:02): or worse, end up like charlie sheen
